turns.text: That's wonderful! I see that you have a good heart and that is so encouraging to me. I'm sure that charity truly appreciates you too. But those problems really have a way sticking around for longer than we would like, don't they? Who knows when the next hurricane, tsunami, drought, or otherwise unavoidable tragedy will take it's toll on an unsuspecting child in need?
